doc.title: Getting Started
doc.description: Get up and running with isolated-workers in minutes

segments.html:
Getting Started

Get up and running with isolated-workers in minutes.

Setup Guide

Follow these steps to add type-safe worker processes to your Node.js application:

1. Installation

Install isolated-workers via npm, yarn, or pnpm.

2. Quick Start

Create your first worker in under 5 minutes.

3. First Worker

Build a complete worker with type-safe messaging.
